title: page unresponsive (only a remix logo shows in the page)
body:
Hi, when visiting remix.ethereum.org it redirects to https://remix.ethereum.org/#optimize=false&runs=200&evmVersion=null
and the ide page is not loaded, only a logo in the center of the page, after a while the browser gives a popup

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1725060/112096869-06507680-8bda-11eb-9e12-49d037bce346.png)

but if I open it in private mode in chrome or safari, it can open normally.

so if it's my contract which I write before & stored in the local storage lead to this issue? It seems I have to clear my cache, but I don't want to, because my codes will be lost. 

(and after I clear cache for the site, it still not wok update at 20210323)

if it helps this is the last code I am working with https://gist.github.com/huahuayu/a0ad3cef2d765b27e269938dfeabc703
@huahuayu I was able to solve the issue by switching from https to http manually. However, I haven't been able to enter the site with an https connection.

> @huahuayu I was able to solve the issue by switching from https to http manually. However, I haven't been able to enter the site with an https connection.

yes, change to http:// works, it's really helpful, thank you!

I tried to clear cache and hard reload but not working.

> @huahuayu I was able to solve the issue by switching from https to http manually. However, I haven't been able to enter the site with an https connection.

I don't think it really solves the issue, switching http/https just means you have entered a different site with a clean local storage. I think the problem here is that somehow the official site has upgraded the IDE, which is somehow incompatible with the local storage data saved by the previous version and freezes the browser.

So the real problem is that the new version of the IDE can load correctly with a fresh local storage, but will freeze the browser if the local storage has some data from a previous version. Clearing the local storage will make the IDE load, but that means losing all the contracts previously stored in the browser, which is not really a good solution IMHO.

@huahuayu 
 I tried with the gist and I can make it work. Did you have any other specific files or folder in the localstorage?

> @huahuayu
> I tried with the gist and I can make it work. Did you have any other specific files or folder in the localstorage?

unfortunately, I have clear the local storage. But https is still not working. 

before I edit this file, it works for like 4 months, no problem.

@huahuayu 

> . But https is still not working.

it's still not working even after having cleared the local storage?
do you have any error message in the browser console - could you send a screenshot?

in which folder was the file you were editing and are you using chrome?
Thanks for helping solving the situation.

of course, I use chrome because I rely on metamask for test, the issue is only in chrome, and only in normal mode. 

the file is in root folder If I remember correctly.

when switch to incognito windows or safari https works.

do you have access to the browser console?
I sent you a PM in your gitter account https://gitter.im/huahuayu 
thanks

> @huahuayu
> 
> > . But https is still not working.
> 
> it's still not working even after having cleared the local storage?
> do you have any error message in the browser console - could you send a screenshot?

yes, not working after clear cache and hard reload, I am surprised too.

there's no error msg in console and no resource loaded in network tab

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1725060/112164205-a7feb480-8c28-11eb-903b-f02da07431d3.png)

what else you want to know?
Can you a screen of the `Console` tab?

I left the laptop just now, I can tell you that, the console is blank. We
can check tomorrow.

yann300 ***@***.***>于2021年3月23日 周二下午10:41写道：

> Can you a screen of the Console tab?
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/ethereum/remix-project/issues/1004#issuecomment-804959078>,
> or unsubscribe
> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AANFFBDO25DLY2MNGQEH73DTFCSDJANCNFSM4ZUO2QXQ>
> .
>
-- 
send from phone
> Can you a screen of the `Console` tab? This is the screenshot from my unresponsive Remix IDE, and it's the same error messages for both Windows and Mac Chrome, for both http and https links.

> > @huahuayu
> > > . But https is still not working.
> > 
> > 
> > it's still not working even after having cleared the local storage?
> > do you have any error message in the browser console - could you send a screenshot?
> 
> yes, not working after clear cache and hard reload, I am surprised too.
> 

Clearing cache is not the same as clearing the local storage, are you sure you have cleared the persistent local storage of the browser instead of just the browser cache?

ok thanks @wuyazero 
can you copy the json value that is logged in the console (see the last log) and send it to me?
Also at this point you should be able to select the `sources` tab and click the `pause` button. Can you tell me where the execution is paused.
also we can continue investigating in a chat https://gitter.im/ethereum/remix or https://gitter.im/yann300 so we don't spam here.

> Can you a screen of the `Console` tab?

please check the message I send you in gitter
thanks i just replied

> ok thanks @wuyazero > can you copy the json value that is logged in the console (see the last log) and send it to me? > Also at this point you should be able to select the `sources` tab and click the `pause` button. Can you tell me where the execution is paused. > also we can continue investigating in a chat https://gitter.im/ethereum/remix or https://gitter.im/yann300 so we don't spam here. Cannot copy the json content since parts of the browser tab seem to be stuck with Remix, clicking the expand json arrow does nothing and I cannot execute anything in the console. However I was able to get a screenshot of the paused source tab.
I am having the same issue and can't afford to clear storage/lose my files. Could this ever work without losing them?

> I am having the same issue and can't afford to clear storage/lose my files. Could this ever work without losing them?

always back up your code, don't leave them alone in online ide. I am lucky, I have a backup several days ago.

> > I am having the same issue and can't afford to clear storage/lose my files. Could this ever work without losing them?
> 
> always back up your code, don't leave them alone in online ide. I am lucky, I have a backup several days ago.

I guess too late now yeah?

> > > I am having the same issue and can't afford to clear storage/lose my files. Could this ever work without losing them?
> > 
> > 
> > always back up your code, don't leave them alone in online ide. I am lucky, I have a backup several days ago.
> 
> I guess too late now yeah?

you may need to wait until the issue been resolved, the code is stored in local storage in key-value format, and the value is encoded. When you waiting you can simply switch to http and everything works. No impact to your https local storage.
@Hendobox we are working in fixing this
Great guys. Thanks so much. Sounds refreshing
@Hendobox could you post a screenshot of the javascript console while remix is stuck? thanks
> @Hendobox could you post a screenshot of the javascript console while remix is stuck? thanks

Same problem here. Can the older version be provided as a temporary fix so we can recover sol files?
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/77327643/112349554-80175b80-8cd1-11eb-99d1-ebc976326f5f.png)

Anyone who needs a quick fix, your .sol file contents are stored in localstorage as base64 . So retrieving lost code is quite easy. Just base64 decode the value fields. 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/77327643/112352932-e4d3b580-8cd3-11eb-8306-5f76c19bc15c.png)

@0xf4u5t @Hendobox @huahuayu @wuyazero @mariogutval 
we've updated it, please take a look to the release post https://medium.com/remix-ide/remix-release-0-11-1-cdb3063327d

hi @yann300 thanks for act so fast. I can use https to visit remix now, it loaded, but when I click `migrate old filesystem to workspace` --> `download and migrate` it stuck, and get unresponse chrome popup.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1725060/112602407-97c81e80-8e4e-11eb-81bf-9e6000b5c46a.png)
